title: Authentication Bypass Using Default Credentials on █████
content:
Summary:
I have found a vulnerability name authentication Bypass Using Default Credentials on admin console of █████████.
Impact
Access to the portal and the data in the portal like emails links data etc
System Host(s)
██████
Affected Product(s) and Version(s)
CVE Numbers
Steps to Reproduce
Steps:
Go to ████████
Then login with credentials username admin and password admin.
Suggested Mitigation/Remediation Actions
Change the credentials
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves an authentication bypass using default credentials ('admin'/'admin') on the admin console of the affected system, allowing unauthorized access to sensitive data such as emails and links.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it involves using common default credentials without any complex interactions or state manipulations. The attack does not require understanding of multiple components or novel logic.
